DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate long-term safety rFIXFc participant hemophillia B . The secondary objective study evaluate efficacy rFIXFc prevention treatment bleed episode .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Efficacy rFIXFc Prevention Treatment Bleeding Episodes Previously Treated Participants With Hemophilia B
DOC.detailed_description: Participants follow either prophylaxis on-demand regimen . The start dose study determine clinical profile patient precede study , B-LONG 998HB102 ( NCT01027364 ) Kids B-LONG study 9HB02PED ( NCT01440946 )
